description: Checks if the specified access is available at the given path.

remoteexception.description: the object representing the actual WebHDFS exception being returned.

path.description: The Data Lake Store path (starting with '/') of the file or directory for which to check access.

fsaction.description: File system operation read/write/execute in string form, matching regex pattern '[rwx-]{3}'

op.description: The constant value for the operation.
